{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05051v1", "title": "Chiral optical forces in a slot waveguide for separation of molecules in
  gas", "summary": "Chiral optical forces present an exciting avenue into the separation of
enantiomers in an all-optical fashion. In this work, we explore via numerical
simulations and analytical calculations the feasibility of the separation of
chiral molecules by using guided light in a dielectric slot waveguide. Our
results suggest that it is possible to separate [6]helicene enantiomers
suspended in gas within several hours when applying optical powers of 100 mW.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics", "published": "2025-04-07T13:20:20Z"}
